fields.title: JUICE – Open Source Music Concept
fields.author: Nate Butler
fields.subtitle: What if the community built their own player, and everyone's could look exactly like they wanted?
fields.body:
Music is as subjective as anything, and in my experience the way people listen to and curate their music is equally subjective. Some people love highly minimal interfaces while others lean heavily into skeuomorphism.

What if the community built a music ecosystem that people could build on however they like? Customizable front ends & features, and continually growing due to being open source.

I wish I had the know how to make this a reality, but for now I'll just share this as an idea.
